events.title: the crew of the HMS Bounty mutiny

movie.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
movie.plot: The Bounty leaves Portsmouth in 1787. Its destination: to sail to Tahiti and load bread-fruit. Captain Bligh will do anything to get there as fast as possible, using any means to keep up a strict discipline. When they arrive at Tahiti, it is like a paradise for the crew, something completely different than the living hell aboard the ship. On the way back to England, officer Fletcher Christian becomes the leader of a mutiny.
movie.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 6 nominations.

movie.title: Kon-Tiki
movie.plot: The true story about legendary explorer Thor Heyerdahl and his epic crossing of the Pacific on a balsa wood raft in 1947, in an effort to prove it was possible for South Americans to settle in Polynesia in pre-Columbian times.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 13 nominations.

events.title: Li Cunxin is detained for 21 hours in the Chinese Consulate

movie.title: Mao's Last Dancer
movie.plot: At the age of 11, Li was plucked from a poor Chinese village by Madame Mao's cultural delegates and taken to Beijing to study ballet. In 1979, during a cultural exchange to Texas, he fell in love with an American woman. Two years later, he managed to defect and went on to perform as a principal dancer for the Houston Ballet and as a principal artist with the Australian Ballet.

movie.title: Miracle Landing
movie.plot: Cracks are noticed in the ceiling of an aircraft. They widen & a large portion of the fuselage tears off & an emergency landing attempted. Based on actual events.

events.title: Margaret Fairchild dies in her van

movie.title: The Lady in the Van
movie.plot: The true story of the relationship between Alan Bennett and the singular Miss Shepherd, a woman of uncertain origins who ‘temporarily’ parked her van in Bennett’s London driveway and proceeded to live there for 15 years.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.

events.title: the last day Chris McCandless is seen alive

movie.title: Into the Wild
movie.plot: After graduating from Emory University in 1992, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity, and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 104 nominations.
